text: @Acyn @RaeMargaret61 You are insane! Dr. Fauci is not working for the Joe Biden campaign, he is working for the American people. It's people like you that prey on those who may not be in a right mind who are going to get killed from Coronavirus. STOP LYING YOU EVIL SERPENT!
